attributes.action: Reduce defaults on your credit file from 6 years to 4 with imediate affect
attributes.additional_details: 6 years is far to long and can leave young people feeling like they are fighting an impossible battle trying to get onto the property ladder or simply not paying outrageous rates on loan and car payment
attributes.background: Getting a default when we are young shouldn't carry a burden if 6 years, criminals can get less for serious crimes yest missing a £5 payment on a catalogue can leave people struggling to get a morgage for 6 years due to high interest rate they are offered.

rejection.details: The Government or Parliament are not responsible for credit reports, which are produced by private companies.
